Skilled in auditing, project management, and safety compliance, with a proven track record in cost reduction and workflow efficiency. Recognized for leading cross-functional teams, mentoring staff, and driving continuous improvement to enhance organizational performance. *** **Master Business Administration (MBA) specialization in Supply Chain** University Canada West, Vancouver, B.C. | _Expected May 2026_ **B.Sc. in Chemical Engineering** Autonomous University of San Luis Potosí, Mexico. | 2020 *** ## **Certifications** **Financial Accounting** | University Canada West, Vancouver | 2025 **The Importance of Labor Relations** | Autonomous University of San Luis Potosí | 2021 **Statistical Process Control** | Autonomous University of San Luis Potosí | 2021 **Principles of Productivity and Quality in the Industry** | Autonomous University of San Luis Potosí | 2021 *** ## **Skills & Strengths** Operations & Financial Management | Process Optimization | Lean Six Sigma Principles | Operational KPIs | Audit Compliance | Project Planning & Execution | Risk Assessment | Data Analysis | Strategic Decision-Making | Team Leadership & Coaching | Effective Communication | Emotional Intelligence | Adaptability | Diversity & Inclusion Awareness *** ## **Software Experience** Advanced Microsoft Office Suite | Tableau | Visual Studio Code | ProjectLibre | Draw.io | SketchUp | Aspen HYSYS | CHEMCAD *** ## Professional Highlights ### Campus Support Ambassador | University Canada West – Vancouver BC (Sept 2025-present) Supported a diverse student body of 14,000+ and 244 staff, directly enhancing campus operational efficiency and overall satisfaction. - Ensure classroom and facility safety compliance, cleanliness, and efficient use of resources while coordinating logistics for classrooms, supplies, and technical assets to optimize workflows. - Act as floor warden and emergency responder, implementing safety protocols, guiding evacuations. Recommended data-driven process improvements to support continuous operational enhancements. ### Administrative Director | Institute of Dental Prosthetics – San Luis Potosí, Mexico (2021–2024) Directed operations for 200+ students and 20 staff, driving efficiency, compliance, and business growth. - Optimized workflows, internal controls, and supply chain processes, reducing financial losses by 50%, increasing efficiency by 30%, and improving compliance through audits and data-driven decisions. - Led a successful CAD $50,000 lab investment project and secured 2024 government accreditation by managing audits, regulatory processes, and cost control. - Built partnerships with 50+ organizations, launching a job placement program that enhanced reputation, student employability, and operational excellence. ### Operations Manager | Institute of Vocational Training – San Luis Potosí, Mexico (2019–2021) Directed campus operations for 100+ students and 10 faculty members, enhancing efficiency, compliance, and student/staff experience. - Redesigned admissions and academic record processes, cutting document turnaround time by 40%, streamlining operations, and implementing financial tracking and internal controls to prevent losses and support data-driven decisions. - Optimized staff schedules, classroom setups, and campus events, achieving 99% student and staff satisfaction while launching marketing and outreach campaigns that increased program visibility and enrollment by 50%, enabling a 30% staff salary increase. - Developed operational manuals and compliance procedures, ensuring regulatory alignment and achieving 100% audit approval. *** ## **Internships and Volunteer Experience** ### Volunteer – Key Contact ### Supply Chain Club – University Canada West, Vancouver, B.C. | Sep 2025 - Present Served as an executive team member, leading initiatives and supporting club operations. ### Volunteer - Event Coordination Lead ### Ambassador for Career Success, University Canada West, Vancouver, B.C.|Sep 2025 - Present Demonstrated leadership, teamwork, and organizational skills in planning and executing campus events. ### Internship - Operations Intern ### QB Chemical Industries Corporate Services – San Luis Potosí, Mexico | 2015 Gained hands-on experience in operations, process optimization, and quality control. *** ## **Contact** alecruzzamora@hotmail.com Vancouver, B.C., Canada +1 (236) 979-9913 www.linkedin.com/in/elizabethcruzzamora/
